LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Fields.AdditionalFee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Additional fee to charge the client.

LocaleResource.Value: Determines if purchase details are sent to EnZona

LocaleResource.Value: EnZona URL of Api payment(real environment).

LocaleResource.Value: Your credentials encoded on a 64 bit basis.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Fields.MerchantOpId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Operation Id of the Registered Merchant.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Messages.ErrorPayingCancelledOrders
LocaleResource.Value: Canceled orders cannot be Paid. Try adding a new order.

LocaleResource.Value: The requested resource does not exist.

LocaleResource.Value: The order has been successfully canceled.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Messages.SuccessOrderCompletion
LocaleResource.Value: The order has been completed successfully.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Messages.ErrorOnRetry
LocaleResource.Value: {0}. Trying {1} {2} of {3}. Waiting {4} seconds to try again.

LocaleResource.Value: EnZona server cant be reached in order to perform the payment.

LocaleResource.Value: The merchant credentials provided to EnZona are not valid.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Payments.EnZona.Messages.Forbidden
